import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Empview() { const {emp_id} = useParams(); console.log(emp_id) const [employee,setEmployee]=useState(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3006/emp/view/"+emp_id).then((res)=>setEmployee(JSON.parse(res.data))).catch((err)=>console.log(err)); },[]) return (
>back
